title: user login functionality
description: Test the user login API endpoint /api/v1/auth/login to verify successful authentication with valid credentials and proper error handling with invalid credentials.

title: user registration process
description: Validate the user registration API endpoint /api/v1/auth/register to ensure new users can register with required fields and receive appropriate responses for missing or invalid data.

title: utm link creation and validation
description: Verify the UTM link creation endpoint /api/v1/utm/create to confirm that UTM links are generated correctly with required parameters and handle invalid URLs properly.

title: google ads oauth flow initiation
description: Test the Google Ads OAuth initiation endpoint /api/v1/google-ads/auth to ensure the OAuth flow starts correctly with a valid redirect URI and handles missing or invalid parameters.

title: fetch google ads campaigns
description: Validate the retrieval of Google Ads campaigns via /api/v1/google-ads/campaigns ensuring campaigns are fetched correctly for a valid customer_id and errors are handled for invalid or missing IDs.

title: dashboard metrics retrieval
description: Test the dashboard metrics endpoint /api/v1/metrics/dashboard to verify metrics are returned correctly for given date ranges and handle cases with missing or invalid dates.

title: metrics history data retrieval
description: Validate the metrics history endpoint /api/v1/metrics/history to ensure data is grouped correctly by day, week, or month and errors are handled for invalid groupBy values.

title: roas roi analysis report generation
description: Test the ROAS/ROI analysis endpoint /api/v1/roas-roi/analysis to confirm comprehensive reports are generated accurately for specified date ranges and handle invalid or missing date parameters.

title: billing subscription management
description: Validate the billing subscription endpoints /api/v1/billing/subscription for retrieving current subscription details and creating or updating subscriptions with proper validation and error handling.

title: whatsapp message sending
description: Test the WhatsApp message sending endpoint /api/v1/whatsapp/send to ensure messages are sent successfully to valid recipients and handle errors for missing or invalid message content or recipient.
